participant_1.background:
I have a unique way of enjoying my coffee, and I'm a dedicated worker who is still looking for the perfect partner.
I love how sci fi space adventures are able to take me to other worlds and explore new possibilities.
I'm not rich but I do have a lot of pictures and stories to share from my travels.
I lost a patient in my arms.
I don't care about social media as much as I do about my relationships with my friends and family.

participant_2.background:

i ve had the same job for 8 years.
my dad was a preacher.
i love the color pink.
i will be moving to san diego in two months.

content.text: Not much, just relaxing. What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm about to make a cup of coffee.
How do you take your coffee?
I like it black. Do you like sci fi?
I love it! I've been watching a lot of Star Trek lately.
That's great! I love Star Trek too. I'm a huge fan of the original series.
I love the original series too! I'm also a fan of The Next Generation and Deep Space Nine.
Me too! I haven't seen much of Voyager, but I've heard good things about it.
I really enjoyed Voyager. It's not as good as the original series or TNG, but it's still a lot of fun.
I'm glad to hear that. I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a great show.
